name: ComeFollowMeTools
0:
”Alexa, ask come follow me for a random verse”
”Alexa, ask come follow me for today's second hour block”
”Alexa, ask come follow me for the reading this week”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: come follow me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ever been getting ready for church, suddenly panicked with reliezation you don't remeber what responsiblities you have that day?
Ever been sitting down with your paper scriptures out, realizaing that you don't know what to read for this week?
Ever been down and wanted a little bit of this week's scriptures to lighten your day back up?
This skill can help with all of those! Try it for free, and also pernemantly for free!

Send feedback at https://lancescode.com/contact.php
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
